dynaForm.name: cases/cases_Scheduler_Edit

PROPERTIES_INF.en: Enter the username and password of the user who will be assigned to the initial task in the case.

dynaForm.TAS_UID: SELECT DISTINCT A.TAS_UID, B.CON_VALUE AS TAS_TITLE FROM TASK A INNER JOIN CONTENT B ON A.TAS_UID = B.CON_ID AND B.CON_CATEGORY='TAS_TITLE' WHERE A.PRO_UID='@#PRO_UID' AND A.TAS_START = 'TRUE' Task

SELECT_TIME_DAY.en: Select the date and time for case(s) to be initiated.

SCH_WEEK_DAYS.en: Select the day(s) of the week Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday

SCH_MONTHS.en: Of the month(s) Jan Feb Mar Apr

SELECT_PLUGIN.en: Start a case based on following registered Plugin.
